# WRC Plant Diversity Data (stem counts and percent c) from 2004-2013

## Importing Data

```{r}
#data2004 <- read.csv("6200_Fall2022/2004_WRCData.csv", header = T)
#data2013 <- read.csv("6200_Fall2022/2013_WRCData.csv", header = T)
```

```{r}
data2004 <- as.data.frame(read.csv("6200_Fall2022/2004_WRCData.csv", header = T))
                          
data2013 <- as.data.frame(read.csv("6200_Fall2022/2013_WRCData.csv", header = T))

library(car)
```

```{r}
head(data2004)
```

```{r}
real.data <- read.csv("6200_Fall2022/Final Proj Data Revized.csv")
```

```{r}
head(real.data)
```
## Graphing

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
StemCount_2004_2013 <- ggplot(data=real.data, mapping=aes(x=year, y=Mean, by= Treatment, color= Treatment)) + geom_line() +
  geom_point(shape=15)
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = "StemCount_2004_2013.png", plot = StemCount_2004_2013, width = 24, height = 40, dpi = 300, units = "cm")
```


```{r}
pdf(file = "StemCount_2004_2013.pdf", width = 24, height = 40)
plot(StemCount_2004_2013)
dev.off()
```
